A game where you will almost rank up then loose 8 games in a row, getting a premade of 4 Ukrainian kids as team mates.
Fajna gra, lecz cheaterzy denerwują czasami.
Good game for team players. but so bad for solo game.

After 1000 hour's I have finally got the grasp on the basics, and I must say, if you don't count the gameplay, the tactical side of the game, the team-mates, the MM ranking system, the maps, the graphics, the gunplay, the coding, the way this game runs, I'd say it's a pretty solid game. Addicting and literally crippling, I'm now jobless and had to drop out of my education. 5/5.
